name: Realio Network
intro: An interoperable Layer-1 multi-chain Web3 ecosystem
introduce: Realio Network is an interoperable Layer-1 multi-chain Web3 ecosystem focused on the issuance and management of digitally native real-world assets (RWAs). Its design is fully open-source, permissionless, and purpose-built.Eliminating barriers to invest-in, trade, & leverage digital RE, PE & other real-world assets through DeFi.
